extension.name: NortheBridge by Design Repository for Kodi

extension.summary: The NortheBridge by Design Repository for Kodi featuring addons such as Arctic Zephyr: From Ashes.
extension.description: Containing the Arctic Zephyr: From Ashes skin for Kodi as well as required and suggested addons to enhance the AZ:FA experience, the NortheBridge by Design Repository is an exclusive and carefully curated repository intended for use with Arctic Zephyr: From Ashes.
